node.title: Man charged with murder over 2018 homicide
node.description: He will appear in court on Saturday.
node.content: ["A man has been arrested in Bay of Plenty over a 2018 Tauranga homicide.", "Detective Inspector Lew Warner says David Kuka was fatally shot at an address on Wilrose Pl, Tauranga on February 11, 2018.\u00a0", "It was reported at the time that Kuka was killed execution-style outside his home and that it could be connected to the death of a Mongrel Mob member.\u00a0", "It was the second homicide at the address within a month.", "Det Insp Warner says a 34-year-old Raetihi man has now been charged with murder and will appear in the Tauranga District Court on Saturday.", "Police are not ruling out further arrests.\u00a0", "\"Police would like to acknowledge the victim\u2019s extended family.\u00a0 As this matter is now before the courts, Police will not be commenting further.\"", "Kuka was described by police in 2018 as \"previously gang affiliated\".\u00a0", "\"At the time of his death Mr Kuka was a devout Christian and mainly kept to himself.\"", "\u00a0"]
